event.title: Duo Wine & Cider is coming to Vallensons!
event.description: We are excited to start carrying wine and cider by DUO Winery & Cider Co. We will launch these great wines and ciders on Thursday, Feb 7 from 5-10pm! Yes! Here’s your chance to enjoy Duo Wine & Cider and Vallensons’ Craft beer on a Thursday night! Refill Station (gourmet pizza) will be here from 5-9p. Cheers!

event.title: February Jeep Meet/Nacho Nachos
event.description: OIIIIIIIO We are way over due for a Jeep Meet! Let’s talk Jeeps over cold craft beers and #nextlevelnachos! Wine, Mimosas, Cider, and sodas also available. Nacho Nachos will be here from 1-6pm. Cheers!!

event.title: Go Texan Day & Bryan Shayne!
event.description: Come out for Go Texan Day this Friday! Best dressed gets a prize! Enjoy and dance to live music by Bryan Shayne from 6-9pm! Foreign Policy will be the food truck of the evening! Cheers!

event.title: Live Music feat. Joe Calderon
event.description: Next Saturday, live music by Joe Calderon from 6-9pm. Chalu’s Wings will be the food truck of the day from 4-9pm.

event.title: March Jeep Meet/Crawfish by Muddy Water
event.description: OlllllllO Our next jeep meet will be Sun, March 10 at 2pm. Muddy Water will be onsite selling their delicious crawfish! Cheers!

event.title: Live Music feat. Joe Calderon
event.description: This Saturday! Nacho Nachos from 4-9 and live music by Joe Calderon from 6-9pm! Cheers!

event.title: St. Patrick’s Day celebration
event.description: Come celebrate St. Patrick’s Day at Vallensons! 1-6p: Crawfish by Muddy Water Crawfish 2-5p: Live Music featuring Patty O’Beers All-Day (12-7pm): GREEN Bee

event.title: Bryan Shayne / Erin’s Birthday Celebration
event.description: On March 30, join us for a birthday celebration in honor of our beertender, Erin! Texasiana Famous Food LLC will be here from 4-9pm and the awesome Bryan Shayne will be performing from 6-9pm!

event.title: Muddy Water Crawfish!!!
event.description: We love crawfish season!! Muddy Water Crawfish will be back this Saturday at 2pm! Enjoy delicious crawfish and craft beer! Cheers!

event.title: April Jeep Meet/Corey’s Kitchen
event.description: OlllllllO Our next Jeep Meet will be Sunday, April 7! Corey’s Kitchen will be the food truck of the day from 2-6pm! Cheers!

event.title: Stogies And Ale Night For VETS
event.description: Cigars For Warriors (CFW) will be here! This great organization takes requests for cigars from deployed soldiers and sends cigars to them! Cigars are a huge morale boost for deployed soldiers and they regularly talk about how the taste of cigars reminds them of home! Learn more about this great organization and make a donation! All donations go to shipping costs to get cigars to deployed soldiers.

event.title: Outdoor Movie: Hop
event.description: Bring out the family for an outdoor movie night featuring Hop this Saturday, April 20th! Come early and enjoy a full day at the brewery. Corey's Kitchen will be here from 4-9pm. Bring your chair, grab a spot, and enjoy the show! Cheers!

event.title: Muddy Water Crawfish!!!
event.description: Our favorite crawfish friends will be back this Sunday, April 28th from 2-6pm! Cheers

event.title: Jeep Meet / Nacho Nachos / Cinco de Mayo Micheladas
event.description: Our next Jeep Meet will be on Cinco de Mayo! Nacho Nachos will be the food truck of the day. We will have Micheladas using our Vilzner (pilsner) with trimmings

event.title: 2nd Anniversary Celebration!
event.description: SAVE THE DATES! We are planning a lot including new beer releases, live music, activities, and great food! Stay tuned for more details. For now, we have firmed up the following... Friday, May 24: CnS_RollinSmoke; Stogies and Ales for Vets; live music featuring Bryan Shayne. Saturday, May 25: Muddy Water Crawfish and live music featuring Joe Calderon. Sunday, May 26 Nacho Nacho and live music featuring Patty O’ Beers
